1.content:
Before you choose a lovely lady, let's go over the rundown.

Basically the premise is simple, you pick one of the ladies and then pick the scenario. Simple. However, what we're really doing here is writing are What If? scenario. This is an old Marvel concept where events happen differently than they do in the main story.

For example:

Let's say you want Spider-Man to fatten up Black Cat. Well, do to the story, he'd have to break up with MJ, right? Wrong. You can make it so that Peter and MJ just never got back together again. Or maybe they already broke up.

Basically, you are free to warp the universe/story of PS4 Spider-Man to fit whatever you want to write.

With that out of the way, what woman are we focusing on?
1.title: The Setup

11.content:
So why is MJ getting fat?

Peter's become a crazy good cook- Basically, ol' Pete somehow found the time to get really good at cooking and has been making MJ breakfast, lunch and dinner. She just can't get enough!

The Big Scoop- MJ starts investigating some kind of cult who have been kidnapping women around the city. She ends up a little over her head when they capture her.
11.title: Mary Jane Watson

choices: MJ's let herself go and put on fifteen pounds
Holy Marvel! MJ's put on an astounding twenty pounds
111.content:
"Hey Pete, question?"

"Yeah?" Peter Parker responded to Mary Jane Watson while he was busy cleaning up in her kitchen.

"You think I've been putting on."

"Putting on what, news scoop after scoop heck yeah MJ you're awesome at it."

"No you silly man. I mean weight, tiger. Be honest."

He didn't need his Spider-Sense to warn him to catch the plate from falling right out of hands but Peter like an respectable man knew a woman's weight was often a touchy subject, one that MJ rarely brought up but if have been on her mind for a while now for her to just bring it up like that.

"MJ you're fine. Look I know we've been eating in a lot since I found a knack at cooking but honestly you're fine your figure is still as solid as ever."

MJ trusted Peter to be honest with her and while a part of her felt like he was just being kind for sake her not getting angry with him Mary Jane took solace in the fact that Peter believed she wasn't gaining any sort of weight.

"Hey tiger how about some desert then?"

"Coming right up, red!"

Two weeks later Peter had left the apartment early, Spider-Cop having to do a few morning patrols MJ pointing out to loose the persona before speaking with Yuri Watanabe Pete pointing out that she came around MJ rebutting that she just as quickly came unaround. The two sharing a laugh together before he was on his way and MJ started to change from her sleeping attire to something more casual.

"What the? I don't remember these pants being this tight before. Shoot Pete and I were in a hurry at the wash the other day maybe I screwed up and got them shrunk."

MJ continued to struggle to properly line and close up her jeans.

"I mean he won't mind the tightness in my pants but I sure will."

The redhead muttered to herself as she continued fight with her jeans unaware that the reason she was struggling in the first place was because she had in fact put on some weight.
111.title: Peter's become an good cook.

choices: Soon enough, Peter goes and brings out dessert
Seeing how stuffed MJ is, Peter waits a little to give her dessert
Skip to next day. Is MJ starting to run into problems?
A month later, MJ is really starting to balloon. Is Peter worried?
1113.content:
After MJ had finished putting her clothes on, albeit with a struggle, she had went to do her typical work time at The Daily Bugle. In her lunch break she went and got herself some food at a local cafe and buffet restaurant, having gotten in Peter’s cooking a rather larger appetite, her belly bulging out more than desirable for one like her and yet one good thing was that it was not exposed at least yet.. After MJ’s work day, she called Peter and they agreed for a special dinner together at her place where they were living at together. On her way out to head back to work she got some rather unusually extra large bags of snacks of typical cafe types, like cookies, cupcakes, muffins, chocolates etc. When she got back, she then got herself with a far briefer struggle into her pajama clothing and placed herself on her couch more tiredly than normal, especially after how it was that her clothes were getting a little more tighter with her jeans a little more snug. Since Peter was not yet back, she decided to have a personal appetizer feast for herself.

She started with her muffins, which consisted of chocolatey kinds etc., then got to some chocolate bars which consisted of ones without and with nuts but starting with the latter of those and saving the former kinds for last, and as she ate those, she grunted in pleasure of how tasty that they were. Then she headed for her other such delicious snacks besides the described ones like cream-filled pastries among chocolatey kinds etc., brownies, from regular chocolatey brownies to ones with vanilla and chocolate icing sandwiched between them. Soon MJ’s pajama attire, as stretchy as it was, even itself was becoming slightly snug from the pants part of it with her shirt as a little tighter, especially as her belly was bulging more and more.

After MJ finished those, she then went for her chocolatey muffins and cupcakes with the latter of those consisting of all manner of styles of chocolatey flavored kinds including ones with vanilla and with chocolate icing covering all those, and eventually went for saving for last her cookies from icing covered cinnamon ones, to ones with vanilla sandwiched between them and peanut butter and chocolate chip and all other such sweet kinds of chocolatey and peanut butter type with the chocolate chip types saved for last. As MJ ended up eating those and saving them for last, considering how large the amounts of them she got were, she decided to have the remaining amounts of those mixed in with some large bowl with large scoops of all chocolatey and vanilla type flavors she had in her freezer with some chocolate syrup and some milk to wash it all down with, and she grunted in pleasure at the tastes in her mouth that she felt, ignoring how snug her PJ Pants were getting and how tight her PJ Shirt was getting on her. “So good.” Mumbled MJ.

As MJ had those snacks she watched some educational documentary show channel to pass up all that time. Finally MJ had finished those and yet despite how much she had eaten, was only feeling partly full from how much she had eaten by having eaten all of those goods, and was looking forward to the food feast that she and Peter were planning, and yet as she was disposing of those bags into the trash can, she did so rather slowly and did the same with her bowls and then went to have the rest of her cookies that were chocolate chip kinds that were not with any ice cream for last as there were still more left. Seating MJ’s own self back down on her couch, she then went and finished those off and after disposing of those somehow with some still good talent at doing such things in such styles throwing them into her trash can, she then began quite absent-mindedly rubbing her particularly round belly that had now caused her shirt to just become rather skin tight, her eyes closed with her smile rather dreamy from the pleasure of these foods.

Finally Peter got back, and changed from his “The Spidey” outfit into some sleeping attire.

MJ saw him come in and pulled him in to kiss his lips and both his cheeks. Then Peter went to cook up what he said he would, the types of foods he was good at cooking as always, including with additional kinds and with additional recipes to it, including of Indian food and Italian food types, and set up a lot of those, only one serving of which he had for himself and gave the rest for MJ to eat, all with MJ sitting on their couch whilst eating.

“Oh Peter,” she giggled, “you are really starting to be spoiling me.”

Simply Peter had shrugged. “Well MJ, you are my girlfriend. What I am supposed to be expected of over that is what exactly?” And MJ had giggled at this.

“O-O-O-O-Oh My Sweet Peter.” Said MJ, giggling from feeling quite giddy from how much food she would get to eat up. And MJ did eat it up, and groaned in pleasure at how delicious it all was.

Soon MJ surprisingly did eat it all up and was now starting to feel really full from it all, but as Peter was taking the dishes to be put in their dishwasher, MJ soon had soon just noticed what had resulted from it all, as she saw her particularly round belly that she thus began to be quite rather-semi-absentmindedly-soothingly rubbing had now pushed up her PJ Shirt.

“Seriously My Sleep Shirt?” Mumbled MJ. She leaned back as she rubbed her belly.
1113.title: “Twenty Pounds?”

choices: Choice Option Selection Offer List I.
Choice Option Selection Offer List II.
11131.content:
What Things do happen from there?

Choice Option Selection Offer List I: - Soon Peter goes and brings out tons of banquets of desserts for MJ to eat and then from there on up either of these sequences do get set up: - Sequence Choice Option I.) Firstly MJ eats up a huge majority of it, after which MJ eats the next ton of all of these banquets of desserts, and then ends up all whilst as feeling “so stuffed” whilst that from out of her request does Peter feed all the rest to her and soon enough rather speedily, although MJ allows him to feed her as fast as he increasingly speeds up his ensuring that he feeds her when feeling full because of how increasingly so that her now already massive appetite is getting; followed by upon all the dessert banquets being gone thanks to them being eaten by MJ, then after that does her boyfriend Peter give her some so quite indeed much here very gently sweetly soothingly so sweet belly rubbing; Sequence Choice Option II.) Miss MJ eats all banquets of desserts throughout the rest of the night with MJ feeding herself throughout the minority of it all which begins of it all and then Peter feeding her throughout the majority which is the rest of it all, and so then either MJ remains to upon their couch or upon assistance coming from Peter then falls asleep on their bed with Peter falling asleep with her - all on top of her belly

Choice Option Selection Offer List II: - Soon Peter goes and brings tons of banquets of desserts for MJ to eat and then from there on up either of these sequences do get set up: - Sequence Choice Option I.) Firstly MJ eats up a huge majority of it, after which MJ eats the next ton of all these banquets of desserts, and then when she requests for Peter to feed her all remaining desserts despite how “so stuffed” she is feeling like from out of how massive her appetite is, immediately then is it all seen to by Peter all of the so whole while all whilst that suddenly, he right then and there up and stuffs MJ right to and then beyond right to the very brim, in which case he gently soothingly sweetly rubs MJ’s belly; Sequence Choice Option II.) Miss MJ eats all said desserts throughout the rest of the night via a mixture of Peter feeding MJ, MJ feeding herself as he rubs her belly, Peter feeding MJ again whilst she rubs her belly, MJ feeding herself with one of and rubbing her belly with her other hand and Peter throughout it all feeding her with one of and using his other hand to be rubbing her belly and in either one of those cases does MJ fall asleep whether on their couch or bedroom and still one way or another so does Peter fall sleep with her - on the top of her belly.

111332.title: Which Offered Choice Options over here?

12.content:
So how will Yuri become large and in charge?

Maggia Stopped- In the games, things with the Maggia and Hammerhead got out of control. However, Spider-Man and Yuri are able to stop Hammerhead from getting away and keep him behind bars. With the city cleaning itself up, crime at a low and her personal nemesis gone for good, Yuri actually starts to relax...

Exposure- During a drug raid, Yuri gets dosed with some strange experimental drug. Weighty problems abound as it starts spreading through her system.
12.title: Yuri Watanabe

choices: pretty chubby—she'd gone and gotten a good starter gut!
kinda fat—Yuri's officially a chunky desk squasher!
really big—she's let herself go to seed, and everyone knows it!
121.content:
HAMMERHEAD BEHIND BARS


Yuri wasn't a big fan of the Daily Bugle, even after old Brush Head started up his weird Alex Jones-esque podcast. But she'd bought up every copy she could find after that fateful showdown between Spider-man, Silver Sable, and that monster. One for her mother, one for her office, and one for her scrapbook. Plus a couple of extras, just in case. You can never be too careful when you're unofficial allies with one of the most destructive saviors that New York had to offer.

Was there a part of her that wishes that she could have done it? Absolutely. Just looking at his smug face, the camera flash catching against the steel plate on his disfigured face, made her seethe from the inside. But what he became towards the end there, thanks to Project Olympus... there was no way she could have taken him down.

All that metal, he wasn't even human anymore. Spider-man, radioactive spider-bite and all, had to have a PMC-grade jet to fire a laser at his skull multiple times while dodging rockets, getting shot at, and dealing with that pint-sized ball buster Sablinova. Yuri would have never made it that far. Hell, she would have never made it even close. He probably would have just headbutted her and taken her out then and there. It was a grim fact to accept, but... Yuri's hatred for the Maggia had to take a backseat to making sure monsters like Hammerhead were put behind bars.

"Or behind glass, in this case." she said with a small smile, touching the glass and leaving small streaks from the grease on her fingertips.

The Maggia were finished—or at least close enough as could be. Most of the smaller thugs had been absorbed into the power vacuum that Fisk's presence had brought in, trading their three-piece suits and gold chains for hoodies and less distinctive outerwear. All of the SableTech was slowly being routed back to Symkaria to help with the rebellion, which meant that the City that Never Sleeps was finally put to bed, as it were.

There was still work to be done, of course. Shootouts, robberies, the occasional super villain attack. But what was she going to do about that? Her precinct pulled its weight and Spider-man took care of most of what fell through the cracks. The Avengers, Doctor Strange, and even Daredevil had been making appearances in town again, so almost everywhere else was fine too. Not like she'd ever transfer out of Chinatown, but the opportunity would have been nice. Now that the Maggia were done for, really done for... what else was there for Captain Yuri Watanabe to do?

That rage, that purpose that had driven her throughout her career, what had defined her as a police officer was just... gone.

That being said, as a certain Friendly Neighborhood Spider-man had once said, "Nothing fills an existential hole like Eddie's Pizza"

And damn if he wasn't right.

She'd started ordering from there pretty regularly. They really did have the best pies in town; she could see why the Webhead wouldn't shut up about it. A few slices became more, then a few more, until the delivery guys started to learn her by name. "The Captain Watanabe Special" had undergone quite a few changes since she'd started getting her fix there on the regular...

"Oof..." Yuri grunted to herself as she nestled back into her office chair, "Gotta remember to wipe down before I start handling those case files after lunch."

She raised the greasy, cheesy, triangle to her mouth and bit eagerly into it. Sauce dribbled from the corners of her lips, down onto her red-and-black button up.

"Mmm..." she said in a hungry voice, "I love this city."

Everyone around the precinct knew that the Captain had let herself go. The only question was... how fat was Yuri these days?
121.title: Power Vacuum

choices: Yuri gets a visit from the Web Head... Pizza Time!
There's a break-in at an old Olympus Warehouse... Yuri wants in!
Just in time for the Police Physical Exam. Yuri flunks SO hard.
1213.content:
Captain Watanabe had officially let herself go—and then some.

Once toned and athletic, the peak physique of a policeman just teetering towards the edge of taking the law into her own hands had become buried under an avalanche of pizza, booze, donuts, and wallowing in self-pity. Without her grudge against the maggia, Yuri was left with a hole the size of Staten Island to fill inside of her, and she'd been doing a great job of trying to clog it with enough grease to squeeze her through the cells in Lockup.

"Dammit, my shirt..." Yuri's double chin creased in distaste as she surveyed the damage, "I just got this dry-cleaned."

She knew full well what a dollop of Eddie's sauce could do to a girl's wardrobe. She needed to get it out before it stained.

Making sure no one was watching, Yuri closed the blinds and began to undress.

Her thick fingers fumbling with the buttons on her ill-fitting top, Yuri made small grunts of exertion as she struggled to get them going. Once she'd unbuttoned, the corpulent captain began wriggling in her office chair, her incredible amounts of belly fat wobbling as she struggled. Her pale gut hung down between her legs, settling comfortably on her pillowy thighs as she was forced to untuck it from her pants. Her fat arms caught in the sleeves slightly—they jiggled in exertion as she shimmied them out awkwardly.

Damn, her "emergency" shirt was all the way across her office...

Bolstering herself, Yuri gripped either of her armrests. The poor chair shook with strain as she pushed off from the seat, doughy cheeks following behind her. The poor woman was mostly belly; no unrealistic body proportions for this unlucky New Yorker. Not like that damn Black Cat. What she wouldn't do for a chest like that... hell, a body like that. She might have even considered giving up pizza for good, if it weren't so tasty.

Yuri's plush body jiggled with her every step, belly bouncing beneath her bra as it hung freely in the open air. Reaching into her cabinet, past a few forgotten (and empty) boxes of Pop Tarts, Yuri found her own "Alternate Costume"...

"If the Web-Head can change his outfit, then why not me?" Yuri curled a flat nostril in distaste as she pulled the cobalt blue tarp over her head, over her chest, and past her belly...

and past her belly...

"Dammit!" she tugged at the hem of her shirt, which failed to cover that last stubborn roll of belly blubber, "I can't believe I've got to go up another size..."

Captain Yuri "What a Whale" Watanabe—reporting for duty.

Right after lunch.
1213.title: Yuri "What a Whale" Watanabe!

14.content:
So why would the sultry thief become a real fat cat?

Love through the Stomach- Black Cat really misses being with her Spider and wants to win him back over. She then remembers hacking into his laptop when they were together and seeing that he didn't mind a larger woman. She never told him that she did that and he never showed that he knew. She never thought such a thing would come in handy. Until now...

Motherhood- Felicia wasn't actually lying that she had a son. Now that she's faked her death and has more money than she'd ever know what to do with, she retires to give her child a good life. It just so happens that it takes a toll on her waistline.

Fat Cat Treatment- Instead of trying to kill her, Hammerhead captures Felicia and gets...creative. He decides that he'll make her an example of those who cross him and that there are worse things than death.
14.title: Black Cat

choices: “AU True Retirement Scenario” with partying, relaxing & especially eating.
“AU Actual Motherhood Scenario” involving things from first two or more options.
144.content:
“Some AU Actually Sincere Retirement Scenario” - Felicia Hardy, after her “directly previous Spiderman Encounter”, actually does decide to “retire from a cat burglar’s life” - in part due to her own moral ambiguity and in part due to her own “inability to find out about any potential new heists of her types” - yet at such points she has already been able to not only obtain more than enough money for it to be more than even she can even try to think of what to do with it all but also more than enough money for her to be able to be “set up for life”, including all of the while whilst via through her having “a-completely-rent-free-penthouse-apartment-home” and as well as “a-completely-bill-and-tax-free-mansion-home” with both such places as in New York City Of New York, with her all of the while being able to be “as rich as any entrepreneur and philanthropist and socialite” and yet be able to be such a one all “whilst quietly”. Thus Felicia, as such, in the very many events following all this, due to the described reasons, along with “a very enormously amazingly great depression over not being able to have “her spider””, soon starts to develop “a-becoming-increasingly-very-greatly-enormously-massively-incredibly-amazingl y-insatiably-far-beyond-unbridled-and-uncontrolled-appetite” that soon starts to “take a toll on her figure”.

“Some AU Actually Sincere Retirement Scenario in which it all is what is involving Felicia Hardy whilst after taking up then here so indeed much quite very truly sincerely comes to enjoy as part of her simple life all but a combination of partying and relaxing and most especially eating” - Felicia Hardy, after her “directly previous Spiderman Encounter”, actually does decide to “retire from a cat burglar’s life” - in part due to her own moral ambiguity and in part due to her own “inability to find out about any potential new heists of her types” - yet at such points she has already been able to not only obtain more than enough money for it to be more than even she can even try to think of what to do with it all but also more than enough money for her to be able to be “set up for life”, including all of the while whilst via through her having “a-completely-rent-free-penthouse-apartment-home” and as well as “a-completely-bill-and-tax-free-mansion-home” with both such places as in New York City Of New York, with her all of the while being able to be “as rich as any entrepreneur and philanthropist and socialite” and yet be able to be such a one all “whilst quietly”. Thus Felicia, as such, in the very many events following all this, due to the described reasons, along with “a very enormously amazingly great depression over not being able to have “her spider””, soon starts to develop “a-becoming-increasingly-very-greatly-enormously-massively-incredibly-amazingl y-insatiably-far-beyond-unbridled-and-uncontrolled-appetite” that soon starts to “take a toll on her figure”; whether in a few weeks or in a few months; along with that kind of a scenario but also with it soon leading thus so perhaps here to a combination of partying and relaxing and eating and most especially relaxing and eating whether with or without partying yet still with lots and lots of relaxing and eating and most especially eating.

“Some AU Actually Sincere Retirement Scenario Involving Truly Actual Motherhood” - Felicia Hardy was still in actuality not lying about becoming a mother to a son yet not only is it not with “Her Spider”, yet also as such “the events involving all The Magia leaders including The Hammerhead never did at all ever happen” and furthermore, Felicia Hardy had at these points already chosen to “actually so retire from a cat burglar’s life” due to a combination of her own moral ambiguity, her own “inability to find out about any potential new heists of her types” and during these points starting from such a choice, she has successfully already obtained enough money for it to be both more than enough for it to be more money than she can even try to think of what to do with and as well as more than enough money in order for her to be able to “set up for life” including all of the while whilst via through her having “a-completely-rent-free-penthouse-apartment-home” and as well as “a-completely-bill-and-tax-free-mansion-home” with both such locations being in New York City Of New York, with her all of the while being able to be “as rich as any entrepreneur and philanthropist and socialite” and yet be able to be such a one all of the while here thus so “whilst quietly”. Thus Felicia, as such, in every single one of all events following this very “retirement choice” of her’s, not only due to the described reasons along with a very enormously amazingly great depression over not being able to have “her spider””, soon starts to develop “a-becoming-increasingly-very-greatly-enormously-massively-incredibly-amazingl y-insatiably-far-beyond-unbridled-and-uncontrolled-appetite” that soon starts to “take a toll on her figure”, whether in a few weeks or a few months; along with that kind of a scenario but also with it soon leading thus so perhaps here to a combination of partying and relaxing and eating and most especially relaxing and eating whether with or without partying yet still with lots and lots of relaxing and eating and most especially eating, all one way or another leading her to her pregnancy and her giving birth, all of the while with her appetite increasing as a side effect of her simple life leading up to, her very pregnancy itself and her pregnancy’s aftermath combined; all with this very scenario itself allowing for options that can involve watching as events occur before, events occurring whilst as Felicia Hardy goes on through her pregnancy and after her pregnancy or else feature events before and skip through and continue from after Felicia Hardy’s pregnancy onwards.

Otherwise Folks, the third option can be an invitation to more options with more scenarios and prompts to all add as a means to offer up and/or to look at and take into some consideration.
144.title: More Scenarios

info.brief_description: Swing by and make the ladies gain!
info.description:
Simply put we're here to make the ladies of the fantastic PS4 Spider-Man game gain weight.

More info on how will be inside.

Rules:

1. Use proper grammar. If a chapter is utterly unreadable, I reserve the right to delete it.

2. No crazy gains in a chapter. EX: Yuri then gained 1,000 lbs!.

3. Don't kill Spidey or the main girl.

4. Please be courteous to writers. By this, I mean don't just take over a storyline, try and leave options for people to take the story in their own direction.

5. As the creator, I do reserve the right to edit or delete chapters.
